course.subject: MATH
course.name: Reading Course: High-order Gas-kinetic Scheme for Flow Simulations
course.description: This reading course covers topics including: 1) Derivation of Navier-Stokes equations 2) Derivation of Boltzmann equation 3) Shock capturing schemes 4) High-order reconstruction 5) Evolution model and compact scheme 6) Turbulence modeling and simulation.
